articles.title: Trump Administration Said to Discuss Taking Stake in Intel - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: The Trump administration is in talks with Intel Corp. to have the US government take a stake in the beleaguered chipmaker, according to people familiar with the plan, in the latest sign of the White House’s willingness to blur the lines between state and indu…

articles.title: White House: Bondi has "officially ENDED" D.C. sanctuary policies - Axios
articles.description: The announcement was made in a wider directive Bondi issued that saw DEA chief Terry Cole appointed "emergency police commissioner."

articles.title: Obama praises Texas Democrats and calls state redistricting effort ‘a systematic assault on democracy’ - CNN
articles.description: Former President Barack Obama waded into the debate over redistricting in a zoom call with Texas House Democrats on Thursday, warning of a “systematic assault on democracy” spurred by Republican efforts to redraw congressional maps in Texas.

articles.title: Crime ‘hot spots’ targeted, encampments cleared, as feds expand D.C. push - The Washington Post
articles.description: President Trump promised to “have the crime situation solved in D.C. very soon,” as officials provided new details about the increased presence in the capital.

articles.title: Trump-Putin summit live updates: Trump says he thinks Putin and Zelenskyy 'will make peace' - ABC News
Jimmy Lai: Hong Kong pro-democracy tycoon’s national security trial adjourned over health issues - BBC
articles.description: Lai, who has been charged under a Beijing-backed law critics say has been used to crack down on dissent, will be back in court on Monday.

articles.title: ‘And Just Like That,’ Michael Patrick King Talks Carrie Bradshaw’s Ending: “This Is Where We Wanted to Leave Her’ - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The 'Sex and the City' writer-director and 'AJLT' showrunner explains to THR why he chose to end the beloved franchise (even though everyone's still talking about it).

articles.title: Warren Buffett just revealed some of his final stock picks as Berkshire CEO - Business Insider
articles.description: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway built a $1.6 billion stake in UnitedHealth last quarter, marking one of its last wagers with the investor as CEO.

articles.title: TIFF Officially Selects October 7th Documentary ‘The Road Between Us’ Amid Outcry - Deadline
articles.description: EXCLUSIVE: The Toronto Film Festival said Thursday that it will invite to its 50th edition Barry Avrich‘s October 7th documentary The Road Between Us: The Ultimate Rescue, two days after organizers rescinded their invitation for it to appear in the Documentar…

articles.title: Judge strikes down Trump administration guidance against diversity programs at schools and colleges - AP News
articles.description: A federal judge has struck down two Trump administration actions aimed at eliminating diversity, equity and inclusion programs at the nation’s schools and universities. In her ruling on Thursday, U.S. District Judge Stephanie Gallagher in Maryland stated that…

articles.title: Blackwater founder to deploy nearly 200 personnel to Haiti as gang violence soars - AP News
articles.description: The security firm of former U.S. Navy Seal Erik Prince will soon deploy nearly 200 personnel from various countries to Haiti, where gang violence is escalating. The deployment is part of a yearlong agreement with Haiti’s government to help quell violence and …

articles.title: 4th person dies after a Legionnaires’ disease outbreak sickens dozens in New York City - AP News
articles.description: A fourth person has died in connection with a Legionnaires’ disease outbreak in New York City. Health officials disclosed the latest death Thursday as they revealed that some cooling towers tested positive for the bacteria in some city-run buildings. The outb…

articles.title: New details, charges emerge as Vance Boelter is indicted in state court for first-degree murder - Star Tribune
articles.description: Boelter now faces life in prison without parole on state charges alongside a possible death sentence for federal charges stemming from his alleged attacks on state politicians in June.

articles.title: Leaked chart reveals winners and losers in California’s Democratic gerrymander - Politico
articles.description: The document offers the clearest view yet of which Republican districts are being targeted.

articles.title: Vikings Get the Edge on Day 2 of Joint Practices, Patriots Finish with a Bang - New England Patriots

articles.title: 2025-26 NBA Schedule Released for Official Regular-Season Slate - Bleacher Report
articles.description: The NBA unveiled the full 2025-26 regular-season schedule on Thursday, starting with the Oklahoma City Thunder opening defense of their championship against the Houston Rockets on Oct. 21.
